title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet
description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!
author: Adi Tantimedh

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch
description: In today's BCTV Daily Dispatch: James Gunn/DCU/Superman/Henry Cavill, Superman & Lois, SNL, The Sandman, The Nevers/#Westworld & tons more!
author: Ray Flook

title: Smallville’s Michael Rosenbaum Is in James Gunn’s Superman Movie — You Just Won’t See Him
description: On his birthday, July 11, Smallville alum Michael Rosenbaum this year will get to hear himself in one of the most anticipated movies of the summer — James Gunn’s Superman. Written and directed by James Gunn, Superman marks the theatrical launch of the “new DCU” being shepherd by DC Studios co-CEOs Gunn and Peter Safran. […]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich

title: What to Watch This Week: 40+ Premieres, Finales and More
description: To help you anticipate and navigate all that television has to offer across broadcast, cable and streaming, TVLine offers daily, weekly and monthly What to Watch digests, as well as an overview of every new TV show premiering in 2025. This week, you’ll find a dozen series debuts (including Wynonna Earp’s Melanie Scrofano in Revival, […]
author: Ryan Schwartz
